2.name: Dad
2.text: Hmm, I see. Sounds like it must be a poltergeist of some sort.

3.name: Dad
3.text: I'm not sure what to do about it either...

5.name: Dad
5.text: Your great-grandfather studied [color]PSI[/color] at one point.

6.name: Dad
6.text: He documented all of his research in a [color]diary[/color] of his.

7.name: Dad
7.text: We put all of his junk in the [color]basement[/color], but I think it's locked.

10.name: Dad
10.text: You've always dreamed about going on an adventure, haven't you?

11.name: Dad
11.text: Well, go forth and protect us all, [Ninten]!

12.name: Dad
12.text: Oh, and if you ever need to [color]SAVE your progress[/color], don't forget to [color]call your dear old dad[/color].
